system.description:
- **Action Cost:** 1 [Combat] action
- **Range:** 30 feet
- **Effect:** Restore HP to creatures within range. Distribute HP equal to your Wisdom Ã— your Tier among any number of creatures. Cannot heal a creature above half their maximum HP. The Mother's love flows through you to mend wounds.
- **Usage:** Uses 1 Channel Divinity
- **Example:** Tier 3 priest with Wisdom 5 can distribute 15 HP among allies
